Line1.BC3FF: Same dream as always. Serpent eyes in the darkness. Shadow slithering through the grass. I shed the skin from this old dying form. Then I am adorned in scales. Free from pain.
Line3.BC3FF: In the scales are reflected faces I know. Villagers who scorned me. Cursed me. Laughed at me. Tongues flick in the darkness. Hear their words in my thoughts.
Line5.BC3FF:
Each life is a sacrifice for us. Each life is a scale for your rebirth. 

I awaken, and a snake is at my feet. Waiting.
